div.p: Maps showing the position of our study locations at Yunnan Province and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region. In the upper part, there is an overview map of the P.R. China, and in the lower part, we zoomed, at the same scale, on the areas of interest (see Supporting Information Appendix S1 for detailed satellite images from each location). Our study locations are marked in gray (urban), brown (rural), or green (natural)
